testcase.name: from date before to date is valid
from date after to date is invalid
invalid countdown to return a difference of 0
countdown from 01-12-2015 10:00 Europe/Amsterdam to 01-12-2015 10:00 America/Los_Angeles to be 9 hours
use case 1 : countdown from 06-10-2016 14:20 Europe/Paris to 11-10-2016 23:59 Europe/Paris to be 3 days
use case 2: (other non working day) countdown from 06-10-2016 14:20 Europe/Paris to 11-10-2016 23:59 Europe/Paris to be 3 days
use case 3 : diff from 16-10-2016 11:38 Europe/Paris to 30-10-2016 23:59 Europe/Paris With skip no-working days to be 14.5 days
use case 3 bis: diff from 13-10-2016 11:38 Europe/Paris to 30-10-2016 23:59 Europe/Paris With skip no-working days to be 19 days
use case 4 : diff from 16-10-2016 11:38 Europe/Paris to 30-10-2016 23:59 Europe/Paris With No skip no-working days to be 19 days
use case 5: diff from 23-10-2016 11:38 Europe/Paris to 30-10-2016 23:59 Europe/Paris With skip no-working days to be 7 days
